org.mmbase.util

Class ThreadPools

  • public abstract class ThreadPools
extends Object
    Generic MMBase Thread Pools
    Since:
    MMBase 1.8
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen

    • Field Detail

      • threadGroup

        public static final ThreadGroup threadGroup

      • filterExecutor

        public static final ExecutorService filterExecutor
        Generic Thread Pools which can be used by 'filters'. Filters are short living tasks. This is mainly used by ChainedCharTransformer (and only when transforming a Reader). Code performing a similar task could also use this thread pool.

      • jobsExecutor

        public static final ThreadPoolExecutor jobsExecutor
        All kind of jobs that should happen in a seperate Thread can be executed by this executor. E.g. sending mail could be done by a job of this type.

      • scheduler

        public static final ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor scheduler
        This executor is for repeating tasks. E.g. every running Module has a Module.maintainance() which is scheduled to run every hour.
        Since:
        MMBase-1.9

      • properties

        static final UtilReader properties

    • Method Detail

      • identify

        public static String identify(Future r,
                              String s)
        There is no way to identify the FutureTask objects returned in the getQueue methods of the executors. This works around that. Used by admin pages.
        Since:
        MMBase-1.9

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        public static ScheduledFuture scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable pub,
                                                  int time1,
                                                  int time2)
        Deprecated. Used ThreadPools.scheduler#scheduleAtFixedRate This method is only provided to use this in both 1.8 (concurrecy backport) and 1.9 (java 1.5).
        Wrapper around Thread.scheduler.scheduleAtFixedRate.

      • getString

        public static String getString(Future r)
        returns a identifier string for the given task.
        Since:
        MMBase-1.9

      • newThread

        public static Thread newThread(Runnable r,
                               String id)

        public static Map<String,ExecutorService> getThreadPools()

        Since:
